EmailTemplate.name: HR Past Due Prob Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Probation Report Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
You are receiving this reminder, because DIR's Human Resource Office does not have a copy of the probation report on {!HR_Probe_Report_Tracking__c.Employee_Name__c} for the {!HR_Probe_Report_Tracking__c.Prob_Classification__c} position.
If you need assistance in completing the form, please refer to this link http://www.calhr.ca.gov/Training/Pages/supervisors-probation-period.aspx
Please email the completed Standard Form 636 (REPORT OF PERFORMANCE FOR PROBATIONARY EMPLOYEE) to PerformanceAppraisals-HR@dir.ca.gov.
Thank you.
